item.title: Israel agrees to ‘limited reopening’ of Gaza’s Rafah crossing once operation to locate hostage completed - The Guardian
item.description: Israel agrees to ‘limited reopening’ of Gaza’s Rafah crossing once operation to locate hostage completed The GuardianIsrael to reopen Gaza’s Rafah crossing after search for captive’s body ends Al JazeeraFar-right ministers said to decry decision to open Rafah Crossing at cabinet meeting timesofisrael.comExclusive: Israel aims to ensure more Palestinians are let out of Gaza than back in ReutersIsrael announces limited reopening of Rafah Crossi…

item.title: Israel announces limited reopening of Rafah Crossing under Trump’s 20-point plan
item.description: Netanyahu agrees to reopen Gaza's Rafah crossing under President Trump's 20-point peace plan, pending the recovery of the final Israeli hostage.

item.title: Israel to reopen Gaza’s Rafah crossing after search for captive’s body ends
item.description: Netanyahu's office says Rafah crossing will reopen in a 'limited' manner after search for Israeli soldier's body ends.
